title: Reza Moghadam: What Happens When the Euro Goes Digital?
description: The European Central Bank may soon announce the trial launch of a digital euro. Reza Moghadam, Morgan Stanley's Chief Economic Advisor, digs into potential risks and innovations.
itunes:title: Reza Moghadam: What Happens When the Euro Goes Digital?
itunes:summary: The European Central Bank may soon announce the trial launch of a digital euro. Reza Moghadam, Morgan Stanley's Chief Economic Advisor, digs into potential risks and innovations.
